formula: a(n) = min{m: m=k*n+1 with k>0 and A010051(m)=1}. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 17 2013
example: If n = 7, the smallest prime in the sequence 8,15,22,29,... is 29, so a(7) = 29.
